title: Analog Clock
description: Interactive p5.js analog clock simulation with manual and automatic modes, demonstrating trigonometric functions for calculating clock hand positions using sine and cosine.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Analog Clock
Trigonometry
Sine and Cosine
p5.js
Polar Coordinates
learningObjectives: Understand the key concepts of analog clock
Explore analog clock through interactive visualization
Apply knowledge of analog clock to solve problems
Experiment with parameters to observe their effects on analog clock
